strategy: Adopt a time-dependent mixed strategy where the row player adjusts the probability of choosing "Coordination" based on the lagged observed choices of the column player. Specifically, if the column player chose "Coordination" in the previous round, the row player increases the probability of choosing "Coordination" to 0.8; otherwise, it defaults to 0.6. This introduces adaptive learning based on opponent behavior, leveraging dynamic response to observed patterns in the column player's choices.
